p: Healthy male Sprague–Dawley rats ( n = 30), 2–3 months old, bodyweight of approximately 200 g were provided from Cibinong Animal Facilities, Bogor, Indonesia and housed in suspended mesh-wired cages and fed with a standard rodent laboratory chow and water ad libitum under a 12 h light/dark cycle at room temperature. All experimental procedures were approved by the University Research Ethics Committee (2085/III/LPPM-PM.10.05/12/2019).
